channel.title: 🏢 Thales on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Thales on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: DiffCut: Catalyzing Zero-Shot Semantic Segmentation with Diffusion Features and Recursive Normalized Cut
item.description: DiffCut, a novel unsupervised zero-shot semantic segmentation method, leverages diffusion UNet features and recursive normalized cuts to achieve state-of-the-art performance.
